recipes.name: Spaghetti with Meat Sauce
recipes.description: A classic Italian dish featuring tender spaghetti noodles topped with a rich and flavorful meat sauce.
instructions: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add the diced onion and minced garlic to the skillet. Cook until the onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.
Add the ground beef to the skillet. Cook until the beef is browned, breaking it up with a spoon as it cooks.
Stir in the crushed tomatoes, tomato sauce, and tomato paste. Mix well.
Add the dried basil, dried oregano, salt, black pepper, and red pepper flakes (if using). Stir to combine.
Reduce the heat to low and let the sauce simmer for 20-30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
While the sauce is simmering, cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.
Serve the meat sauce over the cooked spaghetti. Top with grated Parmesan cheese if desired.
